content: Then the  said to me, “Go again, love a woman  loved by a lover and is committing adultery, just like the love of the  for the children of Israel, who look to other gods and love  raisin cakes ”
So I bought her for myself for fifteen  of silver, and one and one-half homers of barley.
And I said to her, “You shall stay with me many days; you shall not play the harlot, nor shall you have a man—so, too,  I  toward you.”
For the children of Israel shall abide many days without king or prince, without sacrifice or  pillar, without ephod or teraphim.
Afterward the children of Israel shall return and seek the  their God and David their king. They shall fear the  and His goodness in the latter days.
